name: THE CARNAGE CLUB
description:
The Carnage Club is a fast-paced platforming/turn-based/adventure game developed over the course of 3 years. Unite the realm against the evil Snurple by completing side quests and facing various challenges. 

Featuring: 

-A vast over-world to explore filled with secrets! 

-Many CPUs to interact with and to accept side quests from! 

-Numerous dangerous enemies and treacherous platforming stages! 

-Various unique and challenging boss fights! 

-A dozen upgrades and abilities to unlock! 

-Multiple endings! 

-An original soundtrack! 

-Lots of pixel art! 

-And more!

IMPORTANT NOTE 1: This game requires a relatively fast wifi to consistently load. If errors occur, try reloading the page a couple of times or checking the console tab of inspect element tool to make sure few or none red errors are appearing. Multiple reloads should solve most issues. The key is just to be patient.

IMPORTANT NOTE 2: "J" is the select key on the menu. "W" and "S" are the move cursor keys on the menu. Be sure you have clicked inside the game box or else key input won't register.

IMPORTANT NOTE 3: Some browsers work better than others. Chrome can sometimes have problems, so make sure it is up to date. Internet Explorer seems to work well.

EVEN MORE IMPORTANT NOTE: It's been a very long time that I've been working on this game and I could not be more excited to move onto new things. That being said, I'm very proud of this project and I believe all the days I invested into this game were worth it in the end!

Thanks so much for playing and supporting THE CARNAGE CLUB!
